description: Described as being "His face is Yakuza. Attacked by his sister." He is the twin brother to his sister Futaba and knows about his sister`s crush on Takuto. He always figures out a way to add in his sentence hints of his sister`s attraction to Takuto, even though every time he does Futaba has no qualms of hitting him hard (to the point his body impression is left on a stone wall). Though, she seems to hit him after he speaks about anything
name: Kirishima Hazuki
